name: Miasmic Javelin
description: The Miasmic Javelin is a variant of the Miasmic Spear that can only be thrown. Deals poison damage on hit and has a 15% chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while dealing periodic poison damage. Excels when used against Fauna that have a weakness to poison. A list of Fauna that are weak to poison can be viewed here . When the Miasma modifier does proc, periodic poison damage is dealt to the target over the span of 10 seconds. Fauna with:
